description:
build: rename $GOROOT/bin/go-tool to $GOROOT/bin/tool.

The go- is redundant now that the directory is required
to be inside $GOROOT.  Rob LGTMed the idea.

messages.text:
*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=1d4338efa939 ***

build: rename $GOROOT/bin/go-tool to $GOROOT/bin/tool.

The go- is redundant now that the directory is required
to be inside $GOROOT.  Rob LGTMed the idea.

R=golang-dev, gri
CC=golang-dev
http://codereview.appspot.com/5618044

On Wed, Feb 1, 2012 at 17:46,  <gri@golang.org> wrote:
> This appears to be simply a rename, I assume.

Yes.

LGTM

This appears to be simply a rename, I assume.

Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

subject: code review 5618044: build: rename $GOROOT/bin/go-tool to $GOROOT/bin/tool.
